abstract: Neil Genzliger reviews Chris Bell documentary film Prescription Thugs.

headline.print_headline: Review: ‘Prescription Thugs,’ a Confessional Documentary on Substance Abuse
headline.main: Review: ‘Prescription Thugs,’ a Confessional Documentary on Substance Abuse

snippet: Chris Bell, using his own family as a window onto the subject, examines why Americans take far too many prescription drugs.
lead_paragraph: Chris Bell, using his own family as a window onto the subject, examines why Americans take far too many prescription drugs.
